title: Slide2Image Converter
description:
This handy add-on lets you:

→ Capture any slide: Select a slide and Slide2Image will convert it to an image in seconds! ⏱️

→ Choose your size: Pick the perfect size for your image needs from a dropdown menu.

→ Save to Drive: The converted image is saved directly to your Google Drive™ for easy access.

## Simple as 1-2-3! ✨

1️⃣ Enter the slide number you want to convert in the first input. 

2️⃣ Select the desired image size from the dropdown menu.

3️⃣ Hit the Save button - that's it!
